name: BMX
tagline: Decentralized perpetual trading platform that launched on BASE & MODE
description: BMX is a decentralized exchange offering spot and perpetual futures trading, requiring only a wallet connection to use. All trades are settled against a singular liquidity pool consisting of blue-chip assets, where a user can provide liquidity with any whitelisted asset, and in exchange, they receive LP tokens, representing their share in the diversified liquidity pool./n/nFor traders, BMX offers various advantages over existing exchanges:/n/nlow transaction fees/nno price impact/n“scam wick” liquidation protection (while keeping full control of your assets)/n/nWelcome to the new era of DeFi perpetual trading./n/n
